title: Software List Homepage
description: A collection of software and productivity tools for Windows 10 users.

Cloud Storage.description: Cloud storage service with 15GB of free space.
Cloud Storage.name: Google Drive

Cloud Storage.description: A cloud storage service for file synchronization and sharing.
Cloud Storage.name: Dropbox

Customization.description: Set live wallpapers on your desktop, including interactive and audio visualizers.
Customization.name: Lively Wallpaper

Customization.description: A desktop customization tool that allows you to display customizable skins.
Customization.name: Rainmeter

Development.description: A lightweight but powerful source code editor with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js.
Development.name: Visual Studio Code

Development.description: A platform to develop, ship, and run applications inside containers.

Entertainment.description: A professional free and open-source painting program.

IDEs.name: Visual Studio Code

IDEs.description: A powerful IDE for Java development, also supports other languages via plugins.
IDEs.name: IntelliJ IDEA

IDEs.description: An IDE specifically for Python development, with support for web frameworks.

IDEs.description: A versatile IDE primarily for Java but supports other languages through plugins.

IDEs.description: Apple's IDE for macOS and iOS development.

IDEs.description: Google's official IDE for Android development.

Productivity.description: A suite of productivity software including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

Productivity.description: A free and open-source office suite compatible with Microsoft Office.

Productivity.description: A suite of productivity software including Gmail, Google Drive, and Google Docs.

Productivity.description: A note-taking app to organize and store information.

Productivity.description: An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, databases, and collaboration.

Productivity.description: A task management app to organize and prioritize your tasks.
Productivity.name: Todoist

Security.description: A malware removal tool to detect and remove malware.
Security.name: Malwarebytes

Security.description: A popular antivirus software to protect against malware and viruses.
Security.name: Avast Antivirus

Security.description: A well-known antivirus software to protect against malware and viruses.

Security.description: Built-in antivirus and security suite for Windows 10.

Text Editors.description: A sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose.

Text Editors.description: A hackable text editor for the 21st century.

Text Editors.description: An extensible, customizable, free/libre text editor.

Utilities.description: A utility to clean and optimize your PC.
